description: Allows users to ask Alexa the current price of Bitcoin over the past 24 hours. Collects information using the Blockchain.info Public API available over at https://blockchain.info/api.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Bitcoin Price what is the price of a bitcoin
Alexa, Ask Bitcoin Price for the price of one Bitcoin
Alexa, Ask Bitcoin Price what is the price of one bitcoin
name: Bitcoin Price Finder
